testcase.title: Request the children level without descendants for a given Adme Molecular Mechanism taxonomy node id as a user with valid access details

steps.title: I am authenticated user accessing "SOAP" API
I pass a "type = AdmeMechanism  and treeCode = 4662|4663|4664| and  includeDescendants = false" as parameter to "DDI_getTaxonomyChildren" operation

substeps.message: There is an error when getting the value by input path. Error "taxonomyTree" has appeared

There is an error when getting the value by input path. Error "java.lang.NoSuchFieldException cannot be cast to java.util.ArrayList" has appeared
Error while parsing expected message java.lang.String cannot be cast to java.util.ArrayList
